titles.title: Trade Readjustment Allowances for Adversely Affected Workers Act of 2006
To amend the Trade Act of 1974 to authorize trade readjustment allowances under chapter 2 of title II of such Act to adversely affected workers who are subject to a lockout.
Trade Readjustment Allowances for Adversely Affected Workers Act of 2006

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Trade Readjustment Allowances for Adversely Affected Workers Act of 2006 - Amends the Trade Act of 1974 to treat any week in which employment is unavailable to an adversely affected worker because of a lockout as a week of employment. (Thus, counts such weeks for purposes of qualifying such a worker for a trade readjustment allowance.)
